summary: Defines a configurable LSTM‑based decoder neural module that consumes acoustic encoded representations and outputs log‑probability distributions over a target vocabulary, supporting multiple layers, optional bidirectionality, dropout, and state management for speech recognition pipelines.
business_intent: Enable speech‑to‑text systems to translate intermediate acoustic features into token probabilities using a lightweight, exportable LSTM decoder, facilitating integration into end‑to‑end ASR models.
